issue.title: [Python] Missing bindings for existing_data_behavior makes it impossible to maintain old behavior
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14620](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14620). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
6.0.0 added support for existing_data_behavior but not bindings for it (see ARROW-13703).  Since the default behavior changed to error if there is existing data there is no way to override this new default behavior.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14620?focusedCommentId=17440769) by Weston Pace (westonpace):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11632
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11632>
